name: summarize_articles
description: Summarizes a list of input articles using a language model. Supports structured and unstructured summarization, intended for orchestrated ClearCoreAI pipelines.
author: Olivier Hays

input_spec.description: A list of articles to summarize.

articles.description: List of articles with title and content fields.

collection.description: Optional fallback input with articles as 'items'.

summaries.description: Summarized text for each article in the same order.

summaries_structured.description: Structured format of summaries, if structured output is requested.

capabilities.name: structured_text_summarization
capabilities.description: Summarizes articles into structured text using LLM.

usage_guidelines.intended_use: Summarize articles from fetch agents or external sources in a ClearCoreAI pipeline.
usage_guidelines.limitations: Limited to short-form summaries using a single LLM engine. Does not include citation or source attribution.
usage_guidelines.safety_notes: Summaries may reflect model bias or hallucination. Ensure content is reviewed before publication.

additional_endpoints.name: audit_policy
additional_endpoints.description: Returns the JSON audit policy for this agent.

output_spec.description: Audit policy rules in JSON format.
